title: Diamond Floral Pendant - A Timeless Elegance
materials: G Color). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional shine.
features: Intricately crafted with a repeating floral motif. The openwork design showcases the brilliance of the diamonds, creating a light and airy feel. The diamonds are pave set to maximize sparkle. Delicate scalloped edges complete the pendant.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and Dazzling White Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. A versatile piece that complements both traditional sarees and modern attire. Ideal for anniversaries
description: This exquisite pendant combines classic design with modern craftsmanship. The high-quality diamonds and Hyderabadi polish ensure a piece that will last a lifetime. Its delicate design makes it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
